RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 62. Claiming Purse 12200. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 20 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since July 20 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MAY BEAU settled inside, shifted four wide past the quarter pole, rallied under a strong hand ride to make the lead in deep stretch and drew clear. FALL CAMPAIGN chased the lead into the stretch, rallied along the rail to make the lead before the eighth pole then was no match for the winner. VAVITE unhurried early, swung wide and finished with good courage in the five path. SKY chased the pace two then three wide, drew closer in upper stretch then was outfinished. DANZING CHICK sprinted to a clear lead soon after the start, widened on the turn, maintained her advantage into the stretch and weakened late. PEARLINTHEROUGH swung wide and was no threat. DREAM TO WIN chased the pace three wide and was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Danzing Chick
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted clear, widened turn, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Fall Campaign
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, rallied inside, led lane, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: May Beau
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside early, shifted 4 wide 1/4 pole, drew off, hand ride

ENTRY.NAME: Vavite
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, swung wide, finished well 5path

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 80. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 21700. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $8,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $12,500. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 20 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Si nce July 20 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PROSPECTIVE FORUM away alertly, set all the pace and drew off under mild right handed urging to win going away. PRINCESS HALIME chased the winner three then two wide while brushing repeatedly with BLUSHING BETTY and finished clear for second. BLUSHING BETTY pressed briefly two wide, chased the winner, brushed repeatedly with PRINCESS HALIME and faded late. JEN'S BATTLE had good early speed along the inside, steadied past the three eighths pole then lost momentum. CEVICHE trailed. THE STEWARDS POSTED THE INQUIRY SIGN AND AFTER REVIEW TOOK NO ACTION.

ENTRY.NAME: Jen's Battle
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed, steadied past 3/8pole, dropped back,

ENTRY.NAME: Prospective Forum
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, drew off, right handed urging, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Blushing Betty
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed, chased, brushed repeatedly, faded late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 76. Claiming Purse 17400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE SEPTEMBER 20, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 20 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since July 20 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CLASSIC MO broke in front, set all the pace unchallenged, was put to left handed urging near mid stretch and won under strong handling. SPIN DOCTOR unhurried early, rallied four wide into the stretch and finished well clear for second. JOES A ROCKIN chased the winner along the inside into the stretch then faded. MUSTANG WILLIE passed tiring rivals in the five path. THE MAN CAN chased the winner two wide and weakened in the stretch. ACCURATE chased the winner three wide and gave way in the stretch. NOTHINLASTSFOREVER had brief speed. FU ROO was no factor. TRAITOR AMONGST US had his head turned and broke in a tangle then trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Traitor Amongst Us
ENTRY.COMMENT: head turned, broke in tangle, trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Classic Mo
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, led throughout, unchallenged, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Mustang Willie
ENTRY.OWNER: Urieta's Racing Stable and Lerios Virginia

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 76. Allowance Purse 28000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 20 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since July 20 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not C onsidered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: VIOLA was antsy in the gate, pressed the pace two wide into the stretch, gained a narrow lead when put to right handed urging nearing the furlong marker, drifted to the six path and proved best under strong handling. HONORABLE WOMAN stalked the pace into the stretch, bid outside three wide and finished second best. IMMORTALLOVE also antsy in the gate, rushed up the inside to gained a narrow advantage before a quarter, set a pressured pace into the stretch, drifted out late and faded. MISS EASY stumbled at the start and failed to menace. COROMANDEL had brief speed. CHARLOTTES WAY second the second flight two wide, was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Immortallove
ENTRY.COMMENT: antsy gate, rushed to lead, set pressured pace, drifted out late

ENTRY.NAME: Honorable Woman
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, bid 3 wide, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Easy
ENTRY.OWNER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC Tribbett Robert L and Bechtel Glenn

ENTRY.NAME: Viola
ENTRY.COMMENT: antsy gate, pressed 2w, dug in right handed urging, proved best

ENTRY.NAME: Charlottes Way
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, 2 wide, through after half,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 74. Claiming Purse 15500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 20 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since July 20 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FALK never far back, closed willingly three wide under left handed urging, made the lead past the furlong marker and drew clear. MISTERCHILLIWILLI away alertly, dropped inside, set the pace along the inside until mid stretch and finished second best. NAPA DUDE trailed into the turn then closed some ground late outside. FLAWLESS CAT chased the pace two wide into the stretch then weakened. FEVER DREAM failed to menace. MARSICO was no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Falk
ENTRY.OWNER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC and Hertrich III Frederick
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, closed willingly, 3 wide, drew off, left urging

ENTRY.NAME: Misterchilliwilli
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, dropped inside, set pace mid stretch, second best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 57. Claiming Purse 13500. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since August 20 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since July 20 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $7, 500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MANGORITA chased the pace in the four then three paths, went p to challenge the lead on the far turn, dueled until deep stretch then drew off under right then left handed urging. BELLAVALENCIA chased the pace along the inside for four and one half furlongs, made the lead, battled until deep stretch then was no match for the winner. ANGEL'S DESTINY trailed through the far turn then closed a gap late in the three path. PRECISION PRADO away alertly, set the pace off the rail for four and one half furlongs then stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Precision Prado
ENTRY.OWNER: Poole Joseph M and McCall Richard H

ENTRY.NAME: Bellavalencia
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, took over 7/16pole, dueled, no match for winner,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 73. Claiming Purse 12200. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE SEPTEMBER 20, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since August 20 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since July 20 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CALENDULA bore in at the start bumping SWEET BELEN< dueled for the lead two wide then entire trip, dug in under mild left handed urging and got up in the final strides. OPULENT WAYS battled with the winner along the inside and just missed. COURTED trailed early, remained well back into the far turn and had a mild late rally in the four path. MANHATTAN LADY was no factor. SWEET BELEN was bumped at the start, stalked the pace into the stretch then gave way. NO SNIVELING was through early.

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Belen
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, stalked pace 2 wide, gave way lane

ENTRY.NAME: Calendula
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore in, bumped start, dueled 2w, dug in gamely, just up

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 8 1M Dirt CR: 75. Allowance Purse 40100. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since August 20 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since July 20 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Race s For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GONE IN A FLASH broke in front, set all the pace and widened through the stretch to win as much the best under strong handling. CASUAL ATTIRE well placed, advanced along the rail through the far turn and finished clear for second. NEED TO KNOW BASIS allowed to settle, finished with good courage four wide. INTO GOLD bore in badly bumping BLAZING BURROUGHS at the start, stalked the pace three wide and failed to respond. BLAZING BURROUGHS was bumped then squeezed at the start and no factor. CONDEMNATION pressed the pace two wide and gave way on the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Casual Attire
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, middle move, inside, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Condemnation
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, gave way lane

ENTRY.NAME: Need to Know Basis
ENTRY.OWNER: WinStar Farm LLC and Blazing Meadows Farm LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Into Gold
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore in badly, bumped start, stalked 3w, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Gone in a Flash
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, led throughout, drew off, much the best,
